brief_title: Pathophysiological Subtyping of Abnormalities in Cocaine Dependence - 9
brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to define pathophysiological subtypes of abnormalities in subjects with cocaine dependence.
detailed_description: The objective of this study is to define subgroups of patients with differential treatment outcome on the basis of differential baseline electrophysiological clusters.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: Cocaine dependence. Seeking residential treatment.
